prompt: Design a map view page with a full-screen map and a side drawer for navigation. The app bar should have a title 'Travel Map' in white text, a deep purple background (Colors.deepPurple), and a hamburger menu icon to open the drawer. The drawer should contain three items: 'Home', 'Map', and 'Settings', styled with a white background and black text. Place a floating action button in the bottom-center with an amber GPS icon (Colors.amber) and a white background. The map area should have a light purple background (Colors.purple[100]) with rounded corners (8px radius). Use Material Design for a polished and user-friendly interface.
